sandPercentage.title: Sand level percentage
sandPercentage.tooltip: Value from 0-100 representing how much sand is on Ember Twin. Ash Twin will have the opposite value, e.g., if Ember Twin is at 30% Ash Twin will be at 70%. You can also press +/- on the numpad to change this value in game.

sandFunnelActive.title: Sand funnel enabled
sandFunnelActive.tooltip: Turns the sand funnel off and on. Alternatively press 0 on your keyboard to toggle in game.
